Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • Employee
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Administrator, Cashier

    public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class for all Employees. *Sets general to String and Salary. *Handles Log in. *Exports all employees.
